prompts: Create a serpentine Pokemon with rocky textures and a powerful presence.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a snake made of stone, with a fierce expression.
Generate a water-type Pokemon that has a similar body shape to Onix but with fins.
Make a legendary Pokemon that is inspired by Onix, but made of glowing crystal.
Imagine an evolution of Onix that has metallic colors and sharper edges.
Design a Pokemon that combines the features of Onix and a dragon, with vibrant colors.
Show me a ground-type Pokemon that has a snake-like body and is covered in gems.
